name: FOG (itch) (ROSEGORM)
description:
Three teenagers recollect their memories through lucid dreaming after some kind of traumatic event.

FOG is a lucid dreaming game* made by Naylan with RPG Maker 2003. This adventure game features various riddles, active Effects, and passive Perks that can be found while discovering the dream world.

You do not need the RPG Maker 2003 RTP to play.

*FOG is not designed, sponsored, or endorsed by KIKIYAMA, the creator of Yume Nikki.
